thread.title: 22 Reasons People Who Are Afraid Of Snakes Should Give Australia A Miss
thread.title_full: 22 Reasons People Who Are Afraid Of Snakes Should Give Australia A Miss

author: Jenna Guillaume
title: 22 Reasons People Who Are Afraid Of Snakes Should Give Australia A Miss
text:
View this image › 
Flickr: chiaralily / Creative Commons 140 types species of land snake and 32 species of sea snake, to be exact .
ID: 10728809 2. But did you know Australia is home to 21 of the 25 most venomous snake breeds in the world? View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728750 3. And around 100 venomous species in total. View this image › 
Flickr: mikecogh / Creative Commons But don’t worry, only 12 of those are “likely to inflict a wound that could kill you”, according to the New South Wales government . Isn’t that reassuring!
ID: 10728829 4. It’s not uncommon to find snakes around homes. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728759 5. But hey, they always knock! View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728760 6. Unless they sneak in through the light fixtures. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728771 7. Or hide out in kid’s bedrooms. View this image › 
Gold Coast Snake Catcher / Via Facebook: Goldcoastsnakecatcher ID: 10728748 8. Or chill in the toilet. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728762 9. OK, they’re not really big on privacy. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728773 10. But really they just want to be a part of the fun. View this image › 
Snake Catcher Victoria Australia / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10728793 11. This guy just wants to drink beer with his mates. View this image › 
facebook.com ID: 10728800 12. While this one is enjoying just chilling at the beach. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728761 13. This one loves swimming AND getting pissed with friends, which is peak Australian to be honest. instagram.com 
instagram.com 
  ID: 10728780 14. This little lady just fancies a round of golf. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728768 15. And this one is ready for a roadtrip. View this image › 
Mundoo Island Station / Via Facebook: pg ID: 10728730 16. This guy can’t resist a snag. View this image › 
Facebook: 5traya ID: 10728787 17. But you should know, many snakes have somewhat… larger appetites. imgur.com 
imgur.com 
  ID: 10728766 18. It’s not at all terrifying, is it? Facebook Post . Facebook: 7newssydney ID: 10728726 19. Like, the occasional snake orgy in your backyard pool is no big deal, right? View this image › 
Wild Encounters / Via Facebook: WildEncountersGoldCoast ID: 10728796 20. I mean, a snake in your cereal will definitely wake you up. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728770 21. Just don’t forget to brush your teeth! View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10728758 22. WHO AM I KIDDING NOT EVEN SNAKES ARE SAFE FROM SNAKES LOCK YOUR DOORS BAR YOUR WINDOWS BAN AUSTRALIA WHAT EVEN IS THIS COUNTRY. View this image › 
Source / PR IMAGE ID: 10728729 Bye View this image › 
CBS ID: 10735454 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Jenna Guillaume is Editor-at-Large for BuzzFeed and is based in Sydney.
